channel.title: Sumo Logic Developer Release Notes
channel.description: We'll post new features and changes to our APIs, Collector management, and Live Tail CLI here.

item.title: April 25, 2022
item.description: New - The Data Forwarding Management API allows you to forward log data from a Partition or Scheduled View to an S3 bucket.

item.title: January 18, 2022
item.description: New - The Tracing API allows you to browse and execute queries for traces and span analytics, and request a service map of your application environment.

item.title: November 16, 2021
item.description: New - The Metrics Query API allows you to execute queries on various metrics and retrieve multiple time-series (data-points) over time from HTTP endpoints.

item.title: August 18, 2021
item.description: New - The Policies Management API allows you to control the security and share settings of your organization from HTTP endpoints.
